author: Doug Bostrom
content: Hopefully (and the crew should be especially hopeful) 11th Hour‘s skipper won’t need to pass blame downward, as with the 2014 fiasco. (read the amazingly elliptical and agilely elusive report summary on the previous derogation here: http://www.volvooceanrace.com/en/news/8549_Vestas-Wind-grounding-report.html )

author: Old Pete
content: Is this a hard luck sponsor/team or what!? Especially with all the hi-tech gear on board. Last race running aground and now this!!
